title: Purr-fect Seduction
description: Jill Morfranna, a sassy redhead from New York, is enjoying a photo shoot in the Scottish Highlands when she stumbles into an alternate realm. Trapped in a frightening world of strange creatures, her life turns upside down when a sinfully handsome shape-shifter kidnaps her. Will she win Dare of Knight Watchâ€™s heart or will he trade her for his sister at the next slave auction
author: H.C. Brown
